snippet: A federal appeals court on Thursday allowed Nebraska’s ban on same-sex marriage to stay in place, blocking a federal judge’s ruling that it was unconstitutional.
abstract: Federal appeals court blocks Federal Judge Joseph Bataillon's ruling that Nebraska's ban on same-sex marriage is unconstitutional; ban will remain in place until appeal case is decided.
lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court on Thursday allowed Nebraska’s ban on same-sex marriage to stay in place, blocking a federal judge’s ruling that it was unconstitutional.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: Same-Sex Marriage, Civil Unions and Domestic Partnerships
